title: Workplace Interaction-Based Social Constructivist Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science theory understanding and workplace collaboration experience
context.additional_context: Operating real-time collaboration tools using digital devices and conducting project-based learning centered on solving practical problems in science

learning_goals: They can explain the impact of interaction based on social constructivist principles on solving science problems with three or more real-world examples.
Learners can recognize learning opportunities arising from collaboration with peers and administrators and apply them at least twice in projects.
Using digital collaboration tools, learners can collect and incorporate peer feedback to improve final outputs in a project-based learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
